title: The Soldier's Dream of Capital
narrative_story: The superfluous army marched toward the capital, carrying nothing but a dream. They were superfluous—an army that no war required. Their thoughts were profound—sinking deeper than their footsteps. The army moved as one, their armor catching radiance. Each soldier had something to carry—a dream, a promise, a reason. They imagined the crown that awaited their general. This was their dream—to witness triumph. They crossed pits and valleys without complaint. The tall mountains did not stop them. They learned to enjoy the journey itself. Their boots became ripe with dust and memory. At each pavilion they rested, their faces shining. Finally: the capital appeared on the horizon. The air grew cool as they descended into the valley. The scenery was exactly as the old songs described. They would arrive at once—together, as brothers. The circumference of the city walls took a week to walk. Every soldier was counted. Every name recorded. The lucky ones would be presented to the Emperor. They could finally buy supplies—real food, clean clothes. Street vendors rushed to sell them everything. The dream was the journey. The capital was just where it ended.
narrative_arc: A superfluous army marches to the capital, dreaming of crowns and glory, only to find the journey itself was the reward
memory_palace: The March to the Shining Capital

characters.narrative_position: They were SUPERFLUOUS—an army that no war required
characters.mnemonic_image: Roof/cover + a few strokes = excess, more than needed
characters.story: My extra organs are SUPERFLUOUS - the surgeon removes them one by one. I GROAN 'Rohnggg...' - low and drugged - counting kidneys I never needed.
characters.tone_emotion: GROAN - guttural acceptance of redundant flesh

characters.narrative_position: Their thoughts were PROFOUND—sinking deeper than their footsteps
characters.mnemonic_image: Water + redundant = sinking into deep profundity
characters.story: The PROFOUND waters close over my head. I GASP 'CHUHN?!' - but the question becomes bubbles as I sink into silence.
characters.tone_emotion: GASP - rising panic as depth increases

characters.narrative_position: The ARMY moved as one, their armor catching radiance
characters.mnemonic_image: Roof/crown + vehicle = troops under a commander, war machines
characters.story: The ARMY marches over my village in endless rows. I SING 'JOONNN!' - sustained horn blast - as boots trample everything I loved to dust.

characters.narrative_position: Their armor catching RADIANCE
characters.mnemonic_image: Light + army = the dazzling glory of military triumph
characters.story: The RADIANCE of burning cities lights the sky. I SING 'HWAYYYY!' - sustained awe - watching conquest glow like false dawn.

characters.narrative_position: Each soldier had something TO CARRY—a dream, a promise, a reason
characters.mnemonic_image: Walking + army = moving troops, transporting destiny
characters.story: They CARRY my father's body from the battlefield. 'YOON!' I COMMAND them to bring him home - but fate delivers only corpses.
characters.tone_emotion: COMMAND - sharp demand for impossible return

characters.narrative_position: They imagined the CROWN that awaited their general
characters.mnemonic_image: Roof + origin + inch = the ceremonial covering for the head
characters.story: The CROWN weighs heavy with stolen gold. I SING 'GWAHNNN!' - sustained coronation hymn - knowing every jewel cost a hundred lives.

characters.narrative_position: This was their DREAM—to witness triumph
characters.mnemonic_image: Grass + eyes + evening = visions that come when eyes close at night
characters.story: I DREAM of my dead children every night. 'MUHNG!' I COMMAND myself to wake - but they keep drowning, keep burning, keep screaming.

characters.narrative_position: They crossed PITS and valleys without complaint
characters.mnemonic_image: Earth + kang = a hollow dug into the ground
characters.story: They throw me into the PIT with the others. I SING 'KUHNGGG!' - sustained echo - as dirt begins to cover the still-living.

characters.narrative_position: The TALL mountains did not stop them
characters.mnemonic_image: Pictograph of a tall building with a gate and roof
characters.story: The TALL tower holds my prison cell. I SING 'GAOWWW!' - sustained vertigo - too high to jump, too low to fly, perfect for dying slowly.

characters.narrative_position: They learned TO ENJOY the journey itself
characters.mnemonic_image: Tall building + child/offering = receiving pleasure, enjoying offerings
characters.story: They ENJOY watching me starve. I GROAN 'Shyahnggg...' - low and hollow - as they feast while I wither.
characters.tone_emotion: GROAN - guttural envy of others' pleasure

characters.narrative_position: Their boots became RIPE with dust and memory
characters.mnemonic_image: Enjoy + fire = cooked until ready, ripened by heat
characters.sound_bridge: SHOO = 'SHOE leather, the only food left'
characters.story: The famine makes us eat anything RIPE or rotten. I GASP 'SHOO?!' - is this meat human or animal? I've become too familiar with both.
characters.tone_emotion: GASP - rising horror at desperate consumption

characters.narrative_position: At each PAVILION they rested, their faces shining
characters.mnemonic_image: High/lid + mouth + nail/stand = an open shelter standing tall
characters.sound_bridge: TEENG = 'TING goes the bell in the pavilion'
characters.story: The PAVILION holds my wife's hanging body. I GASP 'TEENG?!' - she chose this beautiful place to end her beautiful life.
characters.tone_emotion: GASP - rising grief at scenic death

characters.narrative_position: Their faces SHINING with hope
characters.mnemonic_image: High + mouth + legs = brightness standing tall for all to see
characters.story: The executioner's blade SHINES in torchlight. 'LYAHNG!' I COMMAND my eyes to close - but they won't, watching brightness fall.
characters.tone_emotion: COMMAND - sharp flash before the blow

characters.narrative_position: Finally: the CAPITAL appeared on the horizon
characters.mnemonic_image: High building with entrance below - the great city, seat of power
characters.story: The CAPITAL burns for seven days. I SING 'JEENGGG!' - sustained fire-bell - as centuries of culture turn to cinders.

characters.narrative_position: The air grew COOL as they descended into the valley
characters.mnemonic_image: Water + capital = the refreshing coolness, or the chill of death
characters.story: My blood runs COOL on the palace floor. I GASP 'LYAHNG?!' - is this refreshing cold or the chill of dying?
characters.tone_emotion: GASP - rising uncertainty between relief and death

characters.narrative_position: The SCENERY was exactly as the old songs described
characters.mnemonic_image: Sun + capital = the view of the great city in daylight
characters.story: The SCENERY from the gallows is beautiful. I GROAN 'Jeenggg...' - low appreciation - at least I die with a view.
characters.tone_emotion: GROAN - guttural acceptance of final sight

characters.narrative_position: They would arrive AT ONCE—together, as brothers
characters.mnemonic_image: Capital + dog = immediately approaching, going straight there
characters.story: They execute prisoners AT ONCE without trial. 'JYOW!' the judge COMMANDS - guilty and dead in the same breath.

characters.narrative_position: The CIRCUMFERENCE of the city walls took a week to walk
characters.mnemonic_image: Enclosure with contents - a complete circuit, all around
characters.story: The guards patrol the CIRCUMFERENCE of my cell. I SING 'JOHHHH!' - sustained pacing - their circles matching my madness.

characters.narrative_position: The circumference of the city walls took a WEEK to walk
characters.mnemonic_image: Walking + circumference = the cycle of seven days
characters.story: I survive another WEEK in this pit. I SING 'JOHHHH!' - sustained counting - seven more days of not dying, seven more of wishing I had.

characters.narrative_position: Every SOLDIER was counted. Every name recorded.
characters.mnemonic_image: Ten + one = the man of learning or war, one among ten
characters.story: The SOLDIER follows orders to slaughter children. 'SHIH!' he COMMANDS himself to obey - duty erasing humanity.
characters.tone_emotion: COMMAND - sharp self-order to commit atrocity

characters.narrative_position: The LUCKY ones would be presented to the Emperor
characters.mnemonic_image: Soldier/scholar + mouth = speaking fortune, declaring luck
characters.story: They say it's LUCKY to die for the emperor. I GASP 'JEE?!' - what fortune is this, bleeding out in foreign mud?

characters.narrative_position: They could finally BUY supplies—real food, clean clothes
characters.mnemonic_image: Net + shell/money = capturing goods with currency
characters.story: I BUY poison for my family's escape. I GROAN 'Myyy...' - low and resolved - better purchased death than what the invaders bring.

characters.narrative_position: Street vendors rushed TO SELL them everything
characters.mnemonic_image: Scholar + net + shell = offering goods for money
characters.story: I SELL my daughter to slavers for rice. 'MY!' I COMMAND my heart to harden - but it breaks anyway, transaction complete.
characters.tone_emotion: COMMAND - sharp self-order to betray family
